mdRecord.dcterms:title: Kingston, April 15, 1809: Dear Sir, The Federal Committee of the County of Ulster cannot refrain, on the eve of an important election, again to address you on the necessity of union, energy and exertion, at the ensuing contest. .. : To the polls then-- At the day of election hasten to the polls-- and support, and vote for the American Ticket / By order and in behalf of Noah Welles, John Sudam .. [and 5 others], General Committee. Cd. Edm. Elmendorf, Chairman
Dear Sir, The Federal Committee of the County of Ulster cannot refrain
Federal Committee of the County of Ulster cannot refrain
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Federal Party (N.Y.). Federal Committee of the County of Ulster.

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Printed signatures of the General Committee, with autograph signature of Elmendorf before the printed word "Chairman."
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Handwritten on verso, "Ebenezer Foote Esqr. Delhi." Tracy W. McGregor Library.
